data.title: A Complete Timeline of Rihanna and A$AP Rocky’s Relationship
data.meta_description: Rihanna and her longtime friend A$AP Rocky became much more than friends about three years ago; they welcomed their first child together in 2022. Here, their history.
data.text:
Rihanna and her longtime friend A$AP Rocky became much more than friends about four years ago; they welcomed their first child together in 2022 and second in 2023.

A decade before that, they first became close after Rocky joined Rihanna’s Diamond Tour in 2013. The singer also starred in Rocky’s music video “Fashion Killa” later that year.

Rumors of Rocky and Rihanna’s romance first started shortly after Rihanna split from billionaire boyfriend Hassan Jameel in January 2020, after three years together. A source told People then that “their lives were too different, and it was hard to maintain a relationship.” Shortly after their breakup, Rihanna was seen hanging out with A$AP Rocky more often. Rocky previously dated Kendall Jenner in 2016; their relationship ended in 2017

Here’s everything we know about the power couple, from when they were first speculated to be in a relationship to how they’re doing as parents of two.

December 2019

On December 2, the pair walked the British Fashion Awards red carpet in London. Rihanna wore a Fenty mint green satin dress with matching gloves and wrap, paired with a diamond-studded choker necklace. Rocky wore an all-black tux with sneakers. Janet Jackson presented Rihanna’s first fashion award for her Urban Luxe nomination.

January 2020

Rihanna and Rocky sparked tabloid dating rumors days after her split from Hassan Jameel was reported. According to Entertainment Tonight, Rihanna and Rocky attended the Yams Day Benefit Concert in Brooklyn together.

A source suggested the two stars were dating to The Sun, telling the British outlet, “they’re really enjoying each other’s company and taking things easy as it’s still early days.”

Shortly after The Sun’s report came out, E! shut down the romance speculation. A source told E!, “Rihanna is single. She just got out of a long intense relationship with Hassan. She wants to be single and isn’t going to jump into something. She’s hanging out with A$AP Rocky, but she is not dating him. They have a long history, and she’s just having fun.”

July 2020

Months after dating rumors were initially denied, Rocky appeared alongside Rihanna in Fenty Skin’s ad cameo. The ad also featured Lil Nas X, Tommy Genesis, and Halima Aden.

Rihanna interviewed the “Everyday” rapper in a YouTube video. Rocky answered questions about his skincare routine, throwback outfits, and Fenty Skin. When asked about the most challenging part of working with Rihanna, the rapper said, “I think the hardest part about working with you is not goofin’ off and laughing the whole time. Like, this shit is comedy.” Rocky continued, “The hardest part is not having too much fun. You just forget that it’s still work at the end of the day.”

November 2020

On November 28, the rumored couple was spotted out with a group of friends at the Beatrice Inn in New York. According to Page Six, the two were “seated discreetly behind a curtain.”

A couple days later, People confirmed that Rihanna and A$AP Rocky were officially dating. The source did not provide details about the couple’s timeline or how serious their relationship is.

December 2020

On December 1, a source gave Entertainment Tonight details about Rihanna and Rocky’s relationship.

“They have always had amazing chemistry, and Rihanna relates to A$AP, and it [their relationship] feels natural, easy and fun,” the source said. “She feels very comfortable around him since they’ve known each other for such a long time and also feels a connection to him because his dad is from Barbados.”

According to People, the couple had been inseparable for weeks. A source told the outlet that “it’s a new relationship, but they both seem very into it.” Rocky’s lifestyle as a famous musician worked with Rihanna’s. “They’ve always seemed to have a great time together,” the source said. “They have a lot in common.”

Us Weekly reported that the “Goldie” rapper “has been very into Rihanna for years and was always the instigator in their flirtatious connection,” according to a source. The source also mentioned that Rihanna “would brush off his advances and kept him in the friend zone” until now.

“Things changed over the summer, and they finally hooked up. They’ve been together ever since,” Us’s source said.

The couple became more serious as the Grammy-nominated rapper flew to Barbados to join Rihanna and her family for the holidays. According to People, the pair spent Christmas together.

Entertainment Tonight was told by a source that “spending Christmas together was an obvious step” for their relationship. The source said being longtime friends makes it easier to “get along, travel together, and be involved in each other’s lives to the full extent. They always have such a good time together and definitely seem in love.”

On December 24, the low-key couple was photographed by paparazzi in Barbados. TMZ shared a photo of the pair hand-in-hand as they walked to the pier, seemingly confirming their relationship.

Later that month, paparazzi caught more affectionate moments between the new couple. Rihanna and Rocky were spotted sharing a kiss while enjoying their Catamaran cruise, according to TMZ. The outlet shared a video of the pair jet skiing and tubing alongside Rihanna’s friends.

January 2021

On January 18, the couple and friends celebrated Yams Day, an annual celebration of Rocky’s late friend and business partner A$AP Yam, who died in 2015. E! reported details of the night as the couple arrived separately.

“Rihanna arrived with a group of friends and met A$AP Rocky there,” a source told the outlet. “They entered the restaurant through different doors and tried to be discreet. A$AP Rocky entered behind a bodyguard and ducked inside quickly. Once everyone arrived, they sat together with a group of friends.”

The source said that the group had dinner and shared stories throughout the evening: “There was lots of food passed around the table and laughter coming from inside. They stayed for over two hours before leaving separately.” Rihanna and Rocky left separately.

April 2021

The couple made a rare sighting in Los Angeles on April 12. The paparazzi photographed the pair leaving dinner at Delilah in matching leather outfits. Rihanna wore a brown leather coat, and Rocky wore a black leather jacket paired with leather pants. It was confirmation that their romance remained very much on a year into the coronavirus pandemic.

May 2021

In a interview, Rocky opened up about his relationship with the Barbadian singer for the first time. In the interview, he referred to Rihanna as “the love of my life” and “my lady.”

The rapper did not share when the two began their relationship, but he did discuss what dating Rihanna is like versus playing the field. It’s “so much better when you got the One. She amounts to probably, like, a million of the other ones,” Rocky said. “I think when you know, you know. She’s the One.”

He also spoke about their trip together to Barbados during the holidays. “It was crazy. I always imagined what it would be like for my dad before he came to America. And I got to visit those places, and believe it or not, and there was something nostalgic about it. It was foreign but familiar,” he said.

June 2021

On June 23, the couple was photographed sharing a kiss at Barcade in New York City, a rare PDA moment for them. Rihanna wore a sheer pink dress with a furry hot pink hat. Rocky wore a leather jacket, maroon tank, and leather pants. Later that night, the paparazzi captured the couple leaving the venue as Rihanna wore Rocky’s leather coat with his arms around her.

A few days later, TMZ posted a video of the couple that depicted one of Rocky’s grand gestures for his lady. TMZ posted Rocky sweeping Rihanna off her feet as he carried her through New York City’s Lower East Side. According to the outlet, the couple spent the night and early morning partying together.

July 2021

Rihanna and Rocky went for a date night in Miami at the World Famous House of Mac, where they took photos with the restaurant’s owner, Derrick Turton, who is also Pitbull’s former manager.

They cuddled up for photos, obtained by The Daily Mail, in which Rocky wrapped his arm around Rihanna’s shoulder. She put both arms in a hug around his waist.

August 2021

In August, the couple enjoyed a date night in NYC, which eventually led to the night club Pergola, where they were photographed leaving at 5 A.M. Rihanna wore a Harley Davidson handkerchief top with very ripped jeans and sandal heels.

September 2021

Rihanna and Rocky walked the red carpet of the Met Gala together, an event the singer usually attends on her own. The theme for the 2021 Met Gala was American Fashion. Rihanna wore a dramatic black ruffle dress from Balenciaga with a beanie and over 267 carats worth of Bulgari diamonds. Rocky arrived wearing a patchwork, blanket-like ensemble that looked very cozy.

January 2022

Rihanna and Rocky revealed they’re expecting their first child together. The two appeared out in New York City, Rihanna showing off her pregnant stomach to paparazzi at the end of the month.

February 2022

Rihanna showed off some of her famously sexy and flattering maternity wear at the photocall for her Fenty Beauty and Fenty Skin party held at Goya Studios in Los Angeles. Rocky was by her side, and the couple smiled and embraced one another for the cameras on the red carpet.

Rihanna wore a shredded green halter top with a backless design, over a pair of pants of the same material in a silver-to-purple ombré pattern. Rihanna’s jewelry for the night included amethyst drop earrings, a silver bracelet with violet stones, and a series of Messika rings, including their Wild Moon ring, the Bague Diamond Catcher, and the Messika Bague Exotic Charm ring.

For her makeup, the singer and beauty mogul wore a bright red lip, shimmering gold eyeshadow. Her long hair was worn down and parted to the side.

Rocky wore a Louis Vuitton ensemble featuring a letterman jacket with a matching shirt, a purple Yankees hat to match his girlfriend, and a pair of shredded denim jeans with green sneakers.

March 2022

Engagement rumors circulated when the pregnant singer was photographed out wearing a stunning diamond ring on her left ring finger.

When photographed with the ring, Rihanna was out shopping for baby clothes in Los Angeles’ Kitson, in a vintage Grave Digger monster truck T-shirt with jeans, a statement hat that read “Sex is safer than smoking,” and a Gucci Balenciaga purse.

A couple days later, paparazzi asked Rihanna about the ring she was wearing. She laughed and teased, via The Daily Mail, “This old ring?”

April 2022

This was a tough month for the couple after Rocky was arrested for a connection to a Hollywood shooting in November 2021. He was taken in by the Los Angeles Police Department on April 20. The arrest came shortly after the couple landed back in California after visiting family in Barbados. He posted his $550,000 bail and was released just hours later.

After the arrest, Rihanna allegedly canceled her baby shower. A source told Us Weekly that she “hasn’t spoken much about [the arrest]. She’s truly focused on her pregnancy and not trying to get too stressed.”

The insider added, “She is very confident about everything and has told friends she just hopes for a positive outcome.”

Rocky was accused of being involved with a shooting near Selma and Argyle Avenues following an argument. A man alleged that he was approached by the rapper at around 10:15 P.M. on November 6 and that Rocky fired a handgun at him three or four times. The victim’s left hand was grazed by a bullet, and he sought medical treatment.

May 2022

Rihanna and Rocky’s “very fly” baby, RZA, arrived. Rihanna gave birth to a baby boy on May 13 in Los Angeles, TMZ reported. The baby’s name was not immediately shared.

A source close to the couple told People that the two were home in Los Angeles with him. “Rihanna is doing well. They are very excited to be parents. Rihanna is already a wonderful mom,” the source said.

September 2022

It’s announced that Rihanna will be headlining the Super Bowl Halftime Show in 2023.

“Rihanna is excited for her Super Bowl performance,” a source told Entertainment Tonight. “She is trying to stay on the healthier side and feel good and fit ahead of it.”

Rihanna herself told ET's Rachel Smith that she had a form of buyer’s regret after the halftime news was announced.

“I can’t believe I even said yes,” she explained. “It was one of those things that like, even when I announced it I was like, ‘I can’t take it back now. It’s final. I can’t believe... what did I just get myself into?’ Because the Super Bowl is one of the biggest stages in the world. It’s an entertainer’s dream to be on the stage like that, but it’s nerve-racking. You wanna get it right. You know everybody’s watching. And they’re rooting for you, and I wanna get it right. It’s a challenge I was willing to accept. Being a new mom, nothing would have gotten me out of the house if it wasn’t a challenge like that.”

She added, “It was now or never. Yeah, for sure. For sure. You can get real comfortable at home as a mom.”

She then shared a little about what her daily mom experience has been like and her favorite part.

“Oh my god, the mornings, like, seeing his morning face!” Rihanna declared. “Seeing a baby with, like, little bags and waking up, and they’re just, like, startled. They’re trying to figure out where they’re at. It’s the cutest, it’s my favorite part of the day.”

October 2022

The Grammy-winning singer walked the red carpet with Rocky at the premiere of Marvel’s Black Panther: Wakanda Forever. It was their first red carpet event since the birth of their son. Rihanna’s singles “Lift Me Up” and “Born Again” appeared on the soundtrack for Ryan Coogler’s Marvel sequel.

The premiere was held at the Los Angeles’ Dolby Theatre, where Rihanna wore a sparkly, strapless dress by designer Rick Owens and a pair of opera gloves and matching pointed-toe heels.

Rocky matched his girlfriend in tone with an oversized khaki jacket and matching pants with a black T-shirt underneath.

November 2022

A source told Entertainment Tonight that Rihanna hopes to expand her family with Rocky someday.

They added she has “dreamed of being a mom,” and would “love nothing more” than to have more kids with the rapper.

“Rihanna and A$AP are so in love and have the best time together,” the source added. “They are also a great team when it comes to being parents to their baby boy. Rihanna always dreamed of being a mom and she takes a lot of pride in it. She would love to have more children with A$AP in the future.”

December 2022

Rihanna shared her baby’s face for the first time with a debut TikTok video.

In the adorable video, the baby is strapped in his car seat and smiling and gurgling as Rihanna speaks to him off-camera. She asks him, “You tryna get Mommy’s phone?”

He smiles in response.

Rihanna captioned the video, “Hacked.”

January 2023

In an interview with Zane Lowe on , Rocky shared what it’s been like to be a dad and share a family with Rihanna.

“Oh, man,” he said when first asked about Rihanna’s upcoming halftime show. “I’m just as excited as you guys, if not more. Yeah, I’m super excited. This is as huge. This is incredible. I’m so glad that my lady’s back making music again and whatnot, and getting back out there. It’s just incredible. Especially for both of us, it is a good year for both of us to be more active and be out there. But the Super Bowl is huge, and her being the creative she is she going to bring it, man. I’m excited. I’m more excited than everybody else, honestly.”

He went onto say about fatherhood, “It’s so unexplainable. It’s just one of those things. I’m a member of our club now, like the dad club. You see a dad, you see me. I’m playing on, I’m a full dad now. Being outside and working and being creative, it drives more energy for you…to think and soak things up like a sponge now that I’m a dad, because I have a whole ’nother perspective. But it honestly helps you get home to your family and get home to your baby. And I can’t even explain it, man. You come home to heaven every day. I’m so thankful. God is good, man.”

That same month, the couple made a glamorous appearance at the Golden Globe awards, where Rihanna was nominated for Best Original Song, Motion Picture. Rihanna wore a gorgeous black gown by Schiaparelli couture and accessorized with Giuseppe Zanotti shoes and a Cartier diamond necklace and earrings.

February 2023

As Rihanna got ready for her Super Bowl performance, she was working extremely hard to prepare.

A source told Entertainment Tonight, “Rihanna has been preparing for her Super Bowl LVII halftime show for months and wants it to be the most iconic performance. She really kicked things into gear and got right to work after she received the call.”

They also explained she’s been non-stop in the studio and has been “very hands on with every detail throughout the entire process.”

“It is super exciting for her to get back out there and perform since having her son and she feels rejuvenated after taking some time off,” they explained.

To do all of this, especially with an eight-month-old son, Rihanna has been receiving a lot of support from her boyfriend.

“A$AP has been very supportive throughout her preparation and has really been stepping up his parenting game while she has been busy with rehearsals,” the source said. “[A$AP] and her son plan to be there supporting her during her big day.”

During the Super Bowl, Rihanna announced her second pregnancy with Rocky.

She spoke in a British Vogue interview published days later about life with their baby boy. “We’re best friends with a baby,” she said with a laugh. “We have to be on the same page, but we’ve always kind of had that in our relationship. Everything changes when you have a baby but I wouldn’t say it’s done anything but made us closer.”

March 2023

Rihanna and Rocky continued making appearances out and about as a couple. Rocky joined Rihanna at the Oscars where she performed, and footage went viral of him cheering for her at the ceremony.

They were also photographed together backstage, with Rocky touching her baby bump:

April 2023

Rihanna gave fans a rare look at her and Rocky’s son for his first Easter with the family:

July 2023

Rocky dropped his second hint of summer 2023 that he and Rihanna may be married with the release of his song “Riot.” His lyrics included, “My wife is erotic, I’m smokin’ exotic (Woo, woo) / My whip is exotic, my crib is a cottage (Woo, woo, woo).” In the second verse, he teased a potential music project with her: “New collab’ with my baby mom (Woo, woo, woo),” and he also name-dropped her later in the song: “Pass on a sweetie, I got me a RiRi.”

Neither Rocky nor Rihanna commented on the marriage rumors or confirmed them. In June, Rocky had called Rihanna his “wife” during a Cannes performance.

On July 31, a source spoke to Entertainment Tonight about how the couple was now in Los Angeles, awaiting the birth of their second child who was due any day at that point.

Rihanna and Rocky “are each other’s rock,” the source said, adding that they have “been really great about prioritizing their relationship even as busy parents,” per the outlet.

August 2023

Rihanna and Rocky welcomed their second son, Riot, on August 1 in Los Angeles. The news came out publicly weeks later.

A source told People on August 22 that “Rihanna feels her family is now complete.” Being a parent to two children, “it’s something she’s always wanted.”

On August 24, a source told Entertainment Tonight that “Rihanna and A$AP will spend the early days of parenthood out of the public eye and won’t make any immediate plans to debut the new baby,” the source said.

“Rihanna and A$AP are great right now,” the source continued. “They’re so excited to grow their family and are so united when it comes to parenting. They have so much fun together and are very in love. They already shared a special connection and parenting together has made their bond even stronger.”

September 2023

Five weeks after Rihanna gave birth to her second son, his name was revealed. The Blast obtained his birth certificate and shared that Rihanna welcomed Riot Rose Mayers on August 1, 2023 in Los Angeles at 7:41 A.M.

Rocky notably released a song called “Riot” in July where he discussed his family in the lyrics.

October 2023

A source told Entertainment Tonight on October 4 that Rocky and Rihanna are doing great as a family of four. “Rihanna and A$AP are doing amazing since welcoming Riot,” the source said. “RZA loves being a big brother, and they’re all very happy. Rihanna and A$AP are great at prioritizing Riot and RZA. They have been making sure to carve out time for each child so that they both feel special and loved. It’s been a great time for their family.”

The couple was later photographed out on October 7 together, with Rihanna wearing what appeared to be a statement ring on her left ring finger:

November 2023

Rocky and Rihanna were photographed getting dinner together in Beverly Hills on November 4. She wore an animal print coat and minidress while Rocky appeared to be in a suit.

On November 18, Rocky spoke about his and Rihanna’s best collab: their children. “What could we team up and just like fucking smash and go crazy on?” Rocky told Complex. “I think we do a real great job at collaborating and making children. I think that’s our best creation so far. Nothing’s better than that.” He also credited “a ghost designer named God [who] shaped everything. And we have these beautiful angels, so that’s the best collaboration.”

December 2023

In December, a source told Us Weekly that the couple is considering more children in future and that Rihanna would love to have a little girl in the family after her two boys.

“Rihanna adores her boys, but she’d still love to have a girl one day,” the insider claimed. “She’s always wanted lots of kids, so that’s definitely something they discussed.”

Right now, a second insider said that the couple is “thrilled to be living out their dreams together.”

Close to the holidays, Rihanna told Page Six that having kids has changed her love for her boyfriend, saying, “I love him differently as a dad. This is major, major...it’s a turn on. It’s just like, wow. What a leader, what a great, patient loving...and my kids are obsessed with him.”

January 2024

The couple released their Fenty Skin Lux Balm unisex lip balm together in early January, dropping a promo about the “juicy, Barbados Cherry-powered lip balm packed with vitamin E + shea butter [that] brings dry lips back to life with instant hydration.”

Over his track “RIOT (Rowdy Pipe’n),” Rocky raps, “Flossy, glossy/ Nah bitch this ain’t lip gloss/ Lux balm up in my palm/ New collab wit my baby mom.”

The reel of images shows off the rapper’s face card, lingering on his well-moisturized mouth.

February 2024

Ahead of Rihanna’s 36th birthday on February 20, a TMZ reporter asked Rocky how he was shopping for his “Pisces” partner. He did not reveal exactly what he was getting her but teased he wasn’t worried about finding the right gift. “It’s easy [to shop for her],” he said. “I’ve got good taste.”

On February 14, Rocky and Rihanna were photographed on a dinner date at César restaurant in Paris. Rihanna dressed up in a nude tank top and satin skirt, accessorizing with a 15-carat diamond necklace. It marks one of the couple’s most public Valentine’s Days together.

For Rihanna’s 36th birthday, the couple celebrated in Venice. People ran photos of Rocky and Rihanna kissing on a boat in the Grand Canal on February 21. Rihanna wore a leather coat, white sweater, and what appears to be a white miniskirt.

April 2024

Rihanna spoke about when her romance with Rocky really begun in an interview for Interview magazine.

She met Rocky in the days leading up to their 2012 MTV VMAs performance. “He grabbed my ass!” she said. “So that was the day that we thought we met. At rehearsal, so it was, like, manager to manager, client to client. So when he grabbed my ass that night, everybody thought I was about to—my team was worried that I wanted to have his head on a fucking mantle.” She laughed. “But I was like, ‘Ah, nah.’ That’s why everybody was like, ‘Oh my god. She likes him.’”

Rihanna clarified that when she appeared in his “Fashion Killa” music video, “hell no [we weren’t together]. He asked me to be in a video. Virgil [Abloh] shot that.”

“We saw fashion the same,” she said. “We saw creative the same. We ended up in the same circles a lot. And past that, when we grew up, we ended up supporting each other’s brands and products and creative all the time. I would wear his shit, he would show up to my launches. But it wasn’t until the end of 2019 [that things changed].”

“We’ve known each other for a long time,” she continued. “I’ve seen him in relationships. He’s seen me in relationships. We’ve seen each other outside of relationships. We knew what we’re capable of, and the trouble that we could bring to each other’s lives. We can make or break each other’s hearts. And so, we started dating with a lot of caution.”

“I just let whatever was supposed to happen, happen,” she added. “It was just, ‘This is a flower. It’s either going to die or blossom. But I’m going to let it decide itself.’”

The pandemic accelerated things between them. “COVID sped up our relationship, which I felt like God knew we needed because we were going to start a family,” she said. “And had it not been for COVID, we would’ve taken a lot more time to get comfortable with each other, to even know that we were ready.”

When it came to having kids, “I mean, we didn’t even really talk about it,” she said. “There was no denying it. It was the best thing that ever happened to us. It just happened. I let God lead and just let go. Because in previous relationships, I tried and tried and tried my best, and you still feel like it’s not enough. So when someone sees you completely, and believes in you, and thinks you’re worthy of being the mother of their kids, it’s a great feeling. I felt the same about him. I knew he would be a great dad.”

May 2024

Rocky shared photos of their family to celebrate their oldest son, RZA’s, second birthday. “HAPPIEST BIRTHDAY 2 MY 1st BORN BABY BOY RZA ❤️” he wrote.

July 2024
